resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108339</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108339</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085834</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rethinking reports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überdenken von von Reports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Révision des états</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rethinking relatórios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Revisione dei rapporti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επανεξέταση των εκθέσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revisión de informes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Breathing new life into tired assignments: A little creativity can make research a rewarding learning experience for students and teachers alike. The introduction to a collection of articles that provide alternative assignments to traditional reports.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmende neue Lebensdauer in müde Anweisungen: 
Eine wenig Kreativität kann Forschung eine lohnende 
Lernenerfahrung für Kursteilnehmer und Lehrer gleich bilden. 
Die Einleitung zu einer Ansammlung Artikeln, die alternative 
Anweisungen zu den traditionellen Reports zur Verfügung stellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La nouvelle vie de respiration dans des 
affectations fatiguées : Une peu de créativité peut faire à 
recherche une expérience d'étude enrichissante pour des étudiants 
et des professeurs de même. L'introduction à une collection 
d'articles qui prévoient des affectations alternatives aux états 
traditionnels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida nova respirando em atribuições tired: 
Pouca creatividade pode fazer a pesquisa uma experiência de 
aprendizagem recompensando para estudantes e professores igualmente. 
A introdução a uma coleção dos artigos que fornecem 
atribuições alternativas aos relatórios tradicionais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita nuova di respirazione stanco nelle 
assegnazioni: Una poca creatività può rendere a ricerca 
un'esperienza di apprendimento ricompensante per gli allievi e gli 
insegnanti egualmente. L'introduzione ad una collezione di 
articoli che prevedono le assegnazioni alternative ai rapporti 
tradizionali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νέα ζωή αναπνοής στις κουρασμένες αναθέσεις: 
Λίγη δημιουργικότητα μπορεί να κάνει να ερευνήσει μια 
ανταμείβοντας εμπειρία εκμάθησης για τους σπουδαστές και τους 
δασκάλους ίδια. Η εισαγωγή σε μια συλλογή των άρθρων που 
παρέχουν τις εναλλακτικές αναθέσεις στις παραδοσιακές εκθέσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nueva vida de respiración en asignaciones 
cansadas: Una poca creatividad puede hacer investigación una 
experiencia de aprendizaje de recompensa para los estudiantes y los 
profesores igualmente. La introducción a una colección de los 
artículos que proporcionan a asignaciones alternativas a los informes
tradicionales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
